attributes.action: resign in the interests of the Labour Party winning the next election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon has achieved a lot for the country, but is now seen by many in the electorate as a 'dead-man walking'. To win over the disaffected, it would be better to have a new leader, who will epitomise the 'change' that the electorate requires. Gordon should stand down to give the party a better chance of beating the 'Tories.
